Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: WinXP,WinVista,WinVista x64,Win7 x32,Win7 x64,Win8 x32,Win8 x64,Win10 x32,Win10 x64,Win11 x32,Win11 x64,Win12 x32,Win12 x64,Win Other
Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Added a network client search engine, processing is faster too.

English.Char_Desc_250: Monitors your system ram, cpu usage, page file load - {swap file}, and the system power in real time. Also displays your current I.P. address. The power usage meter is perfect for laptops, notebooks, and netbooks.
English.Char_Desc_450:
Monitors your system ram, cpu usage, page file load - {swap file}, and the system power in real time. Also displays your current I.P. address. The power usage meter is perfect for laptops, notebooks, and netbooks.
Just drag the small window to where you want it on the screen. It will remember its posi
English.Char_Desc_2000:
Monitors your system ram, cpu usage, page file load - {swap file}, and the system power in real time. Also displays your current I.P. address. The power usage meter is perfect for laptops, notebooks, and netbooks.
Just drag the small window to where you want it on the screen. It will remember its position the next time you start it up again.
